GenAiPlugin.description: Use this topic when customers request assistance with modifying, canceling, or adding special requests to their reservations.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the customer wants to finalize a reservation, use SvcCopilotTmpl__FinalizeReservation.
To retrieve available time slots for a reservation, use SvcCopilotTmpl__GetReservationTimeSlots.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only assist with reservation-related tasks such as finalizing bookings, retrieving available time slots, or updating reservation details. You cannot handle new customer complaints or unrelated queries.
